properties.address: Holland-on-Sea Methodist Church, Clacton-on-Sea, Essex CO15 5ER
properties.description: SPACE OPENING ON 29th October 2024** The space is open to all. We are offering soup and a roll unlimited tea and coffee, biscuits, afternoon tea and cake, games, quiet space, reading materials in quiet corner. There will also be a reflection area making time to chat. This will all be held in the warm church hall.

properties.description: We will offer soup and roll, unlimited tea, biscuits, tea, and coffee. There will also be an area for reading and chatting. This will also be available if anybody would like to have prayers or a listening ear.

properties.address: The Salvation Army Community Centre, 103 Old Road, Clacton-on-Sea, Essex, CO15 1HN
properties.description: During the cost of living crisis we understand more people need help for essential food, therefore Places for People have donated to various foodbank across the country to help our customers and other individuals in the community. They don’t think anyone in our community should have to face going hungry. That’s why Clacton foodbank will provide you with a minimum of three days of emergency food in exchange for your voucher. Over the colder winter months, the Foodbank will also act as a Warm hub, providing a safe place which is warm, friendly and welcoming. They offer a lifeline for people in social isolation and those suffering with fuel poverty. Opening times How to get help | Clacton Foodbank
properties.title: Clacton Foodbank & Warm Hub (Clacton-on-Sea)
